text: The Sibu Heritage Centre is a heritage center in Sibu, Sarawak, Malaysia. ==Architecture== The center is housed in the former building of Sibu Municipal Council. ==Exhibitions== The center displays the cultural heritage of various ethnic groups in central Sarawak. ==Opening time== The center opens everyday except Mondays from 8:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m. ==See also== * List of tourist attractions in Malaysia ==References== ==External links== * Category:Art museums and galleries in Malaysia Category:Buildings and structures in Sarawak
title: Sibu Heritage Centre
